mapper.select: SELECT pi.ID AS id ,pi.PROGRAM_NUMBER AS programNumber ,pi.PROGRAM_NAME AS programName,ui.USER_NAME AS userName,ui.ID AS userId FROM tbl_program_info pi LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info ui ON pi.MANAGE_USER_ID = ui.ID WHERE pi.ID = #{programId}

SELECT DISTINCT pro.ID AS projectId,pro.DEVELOPMENT_MODE AS developmentMode,pro.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName,pro.PROJECT_STATUS AS projectStatus,ui.USER_NAME AS userName,pro.PROJECT_SCHEDULE_STATUS AS projectScheduleStatus FROM tbl_program_project pp LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro on pp.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info ui on pro.MANAGER_USER_ID = ui.ID WHERE pp.PROGRAM_ID = #{programId} AND pp.STATUS = 1 AND pro.STATUS = 1 AND ui.USER_STATUS =1

SELECT PROJECT_ID AS projectId ,PLAN_NAME AS planName,PLAN_START_DATE AS planStartDate,PLAN_END_DATE AS planEndDate,PLAN_SCHEDULE AS currentProgress FROM tbl_project_plan WHERE STATUS = 1 AND PROJECT_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT pro.ID FROM tbl_program_project pp LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro ON pp.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID WHERE pp.PROGRAM_ID = #{programId} AND pp.STATUS = 1 AND pro.DEVELOPMENT_MODE = 2 AND pro.STATUS = 1) AND PLAN_START_MILESTONE = 1 OR PLAN_END_MILESTONE =1

select DISTINCT spr.ID AS sprintId,spr.PROJECT_ID AS projectId,spr.SPRINT_START_DATE AS planNewStartDate , spr.SPRINT_END_DATE AS planNewEndDate from tbl_sprint_info spr LEFT JOIN tbl_program_project pp ON spr.PROJECT_ID = pp.PROJECT_ID where pp.PROGRAM_ID = #{programId} AND #{currentDate} >= spr.SPRINT_START_DATE AND #{currentDate} <= spr.SPRINT_END_DATE

SELECT spr.PROJECT_ID AS projectId,SUM(req.ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD) AS estimateWorkload,DATE_FORMAT(req.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createDate FROM tbl_sprint_info spr LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature req ON spr.ID = req.SPRINT_ID WHERE spr.PROJECT_ID IN ( select DISTINCT pp.PROJECT_ID from tbl_program_project pp LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro ON pp.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID where pp.PROGRAM_ID = #{programId} AND pp.STATUS = 1 AND pro.DEVELOPMENT_MODE = 1 AND pro.STATUS = 1 ) AND req.STATUS = 1 AND spr.STATUS =1 AND #{currentDate} >= spr.SPRINT_START_DATE AND #{currentDate} <= spr.SPRINT_END_DATE GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(req.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),spr.PROJECT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT pro.PROJECT_ID AS id,tic.NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent,tic.CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM tbl_notice_info tic LEFT JOIN tbl_project_notice pro ON tic.ID = pro.NOTICE_ID WHERE pro.PROJECT_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT pro.ID FROM tbl_program_project pp LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro on pp.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info ui on pro.MANAGER_USER_ID = ui.ID WHERE pp.PROGRAM_ID = #{programId} AND pp.STATUS = 1 AND pro.STATUS = 1 AND ui.USER_STATUS =1) AND #{currentDate} >= tic.START_TIME AND #{currentDate} <= tic.END_TIME AND tic.STATUS =1 AND pro.STATUS=1

SELECT DISTINCT pl.ID AS planId,pl.PLAN_NAME AS PlanName,spr.ID AS sprintId FROM tbl_project_plan pl LEFT JOIN tbl_sprint_info spr ON pl.ID = spr.PROJECT_PLAN_ID WHERE pl.STATUS = 1 AND spr.STATUS = 1 AND pl.PROJECT_ID = #{programId}

SELECT DISTINCT pro.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName,ps.SYSTEM_ID AS id FROM tbl_program_project pp LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro ON pp.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info ui ON pro.MANAGER_USER_ID = ui.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_project_system ps ON pro.ID = ps.PROJECT_ID WHERE pp.PROGRAM_ID = #{programId} AND pp.STATUS = 1 AND pro.STATUS = 1 AND ui.USER_STATUS =1 AND ps.STATUS =1
